column4: Hello. I'm going through the tutorial on https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/bcm43xx , section about b43- no internet connection. I am having trouble locating the pool folder
the step says,"b43-fwcutter is located on the Ubuntu install media under ../pool/main/b/b43-fwcutter/ and patch is located under ../pool/main/p/patch/ or both in the official repositories online.
